test_cases.Title: PrizeDecryptionThreshold_001_Requirement1_PaymentProcedure_TEST_Web

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the online SuperEnalotto SuperStar platform as a registered user.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and navigated to the dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Simulate or verify a win with a prize amount of exactly €10,500.00.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize win is registered in the user's account with the specified amount.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the prize withdrawal process for the €10,500.00 win.
Steps.Expected Result: System prompts for decryption of the user's personal data (anagrafiche) as part of the withdrawal process.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User account is registered and verified.
2. User has won an online prize of exactly €10,500.00.
3. System is configured with the updated decryption threshold.
test_cases.Dataset: Registered user credentials; simulated prize win of €10,500.00.
test_cases.Expected Result: For an online win of €10,500.00, the system requires decryption of the user's personal data before payment is processed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the exact threshold scenario for decryption requirement.

test_cases.Title: PrizePayment_001_PhysicalTicketPayment_SuperEnalotto_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Sirio application on the desktop system.
Steps.Expected Result: Sirio application is successfully launched and accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Prize Payment' function for SuperEnalotto.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize Payment interface for SuperEnalotto is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the details of a physical ticket (any amount) presented at the Milan prize office.
Steps.Expected Result: Ticket details are accepted and displayed for review.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the payment request for the physical ticket prize.
Steps.Expected Result: System processes the payment and confirms successful transaction.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials to access Sirio.
2. Sirio application is installed and operational.
3. Physical ticket is valid and not previously paid.
4. User is at the Milan or Rome prize office.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid physical SuperEnalotto ticket details (any amount), user credentials.
test_cases.Expected Result: Physical ticket prize is paid successfully via Sirio for SuperEnalotto at the Milan or Rome prize office.

test_cases.Title: PrizePayment_002_OnlinePrizeOver5200_Authorization_SuperEnalotto_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Sirio application on the desktop system.
Steps.Expected Result: Sirio application is successfully launched and accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Prize Payment' function for SuperEnalotto.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize Payment interface for SuperEnalotto is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the details of an online play with a gross prize amount greater than €5,200, requested at the Milan prize office.
Steps.Expected Result: Online play details are accepted and displayed for review.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the ADM commission verification and authorization process.
Steps.Expected Result: System requests and receives ADM commission authorization.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the payment request after ADM authorization is granted.
Steps.Expected Result: System processes the payment and confirms successful transaction.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials to access Sirio.
2. Sirio application is installed and operational.
3. Online play prize is greater than €5,200 and is valid.
4. User is at the Milan or Rome prize office.
5. ADM commission is available for authorization.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid online SuperEnalotto play details (prize > €5,200), user credentials, ADM commission authorization data.
test_cases.Expected Result: Online prize over €5,200 is paid successfully via Sirio after ADM commission authorization at the Milan or Rome prize office.

test_cases.Title: PrizePayment_003_ReservedPrizePayment_PPP_NPL_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the NPL application on the desktop system.
Steps.Expected Result: NPL application is successfully launched and accessible.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Prize Payment' function for a GNTN game (excluding SuperEnalotto).
Steps.Expected Result: Prize Payment interface for the selected GNTN game is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the details of a prize (physical ticket or online play) with a gross amount between €5,200 and €52,000, reserved via TG at a PPP.
Steps.Expected Result: Prize details are accepted and displayed for review.

Steps.Step Description: If the prize is from an online play, initiate ADM commission verification and authorization.
Steps.Expected Result: System requests and receives ADM commission authorization if required.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the payment request for the reserved prize.
Steps.Expected Result: System processes the payment and confirms successful transaction.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials to access NPL.
2. NPL application is installed and operational.
3. Prize (physical or online) is between €5,200 and €52,000 and has been reserved via TG at a PPP.
4. ADM commission is available for online play authorization if needed.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid GNTN game prize details (physical or online, €5,200-€52,000), reservation confirmation, user credentials, ADM commission authorization data (if online).
test_cases.Expected Result: Reserved prize between €5,200 and €52,000 is paid successfully via NPL at PPP, with ADM commission authorization if online.

test_cases.Title: VerifyWinLimitUpdate_001_VerificaVincite_GNTN_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the GNTN online platform as a user with a valid account.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Verifica Vincite' (Check Winnings) section.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Verifica Vincite' section is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a winning ticket with a gross amount of €10,499.99 and submit for verification.
Steps.Expected Result: The system does not display this win as eligible for Prize Payment operations.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a winning ticket with a gross amount of €10,500.00 and submit for verification.
Steps.Expected Result: The system displays this win as eligible for Prize Payment operations.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a winning ticket with a gross amount of €10,500.01 and submit for verification.
Steps.Expected Result: The system displays this win as eligible for Prize Payment operations.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User account is active and verified.
2. Test environment is configured with updated win limit (10,500€).
3. Test tickets with specified win amounts are available in the system.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials; winning tickets with amounts: €10,499.99, €10,500.00, €10,500.01.
test_cases.Expected Result: Only winnings greater than or equal to €10,500.00 are considered for Prize Payment operations; lower amounts are excluded.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the verification of the new win limit in the 'Verifica Vincite' service.

Steps.Expected Result: The system allows Prize Payment for this amount.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to request Prize Payment for a win of €10,500.01.
Steps.Expected Result: The system allows Prize Payment for this amount.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User account is active and verified.
2. Test environment is configured with updated win limit (10,500€).

test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers Prize Payment eligibility based on the new win limit.

test_cases.Title: AccountMovement_003_MovimentazioneConto_GNTN_TEST_Desktop

test_cases.Title: ReportGeneration_001_GlobaliInteriDaPagare_Sirio_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the Sirio application with valid credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in and main dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Stampe vincite zona' menu.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Stampe vincite zona' menu is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Globali interi da pagare' report option.
Steps.Expected Result: The report selection interface for 'Globali interi da pagare' is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select a valid concorso (draw) from the available list.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected concorso is highlighted and ready for report generation.

Steps.Step Description: Enable the 'Solo vincite a distanza' flag.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Solo vincite a distanza' flag is checked.

Steps.Step Description: Generate the report.
Steps.Expected Result: The report is generated and displayed on screen.

Steps.Step Description: Review the report and verify that only winning tickets with a gross amount greater than €10,500.00 are listed.
Steps.Expected Result: All listed tickets have a gross amount strictly greater than €10,500.00. No tickets with an amount equal to or less than €10,500.00 are present.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials for Sirio.
2. At least one concorso with winning tickets above and below €10,500.00 exists in the system.
3. User has access to the 'Stampe vincite zona' menu.
test_cases.Dataset: User credentials; concorso with mixed winning ticket amounts; at least one ticket > €10,500.00 and one ≤ €10,500.00.
test_cases.Expected Result: The report lists only winning tickets with a gross amount greater than €10,500.00 for the selected concorso when 'Solo vincite a distanza' is enabled.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_001_VerificaVincite_ServizioAccredito_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win an amount less than or equal to €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is displayed showing the win.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the user is not logged in.
Steps.Expected Result: The digital receipt is visible with the accredito banner present.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the accredito banner/button.
Steps.Expected Result: The registration flow for the Rivenditore is triggered.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. GNTN product play with WinBox enabled has been completed.
2. The play resulted in a win ≤ €10,500.
3. User is not logged in.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample winning play with WinBox enabled, amount ≤ €10,500, user not logged in.
test_cases.Expected Result: For a non-logged-in user with a winning receipt ≤ €10,500, the accredito banner is shown and clicking it triggers the registration flow.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_002_VerificaVincite_ServizioAccredito_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win an amount less than or equal to €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is displayed showing the win.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the user is not logged in.
Steps.Expected Result: The digital receipt is visible with the accredito banner present.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the accredito banner/button.
Steps.Expected Result: If the Rivenditore does not provide the registration flow, an informational modal appears with the message: 'Per procedere hai bisogno di un conto di gioco. Accedi al tuo profilo se hai già un conto di gioco, oppure registrati dall'applicazione e riprova.' and an OK button.

Steps.Step Description: Click the OK button on the modal.
Steps.Expected Result: The modal closes and the digital receipt is shown again.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. GNTN product play with WinBox enabled has been completed.
2. The play resulted in a win ≤ €10,500.
3. User is not logged in.
4. Rivenditore does not provide registration flow.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample winning play with WinBox enabled, amount ≤ €10,500, user not logged in, Rivenditore without registration flow.
test_cases.Expected Result: If the registration flow is not available, an informational modal is shown with the correct message and closes on OK, returning to the receipt.

test_cases.Title: AccreditoBanner_003_VerificaVincite_ServizioAccredito_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Log in as a user who has not activated the accredito service.
Steps.Expected Result: User is logged in and has not activated the accredito service.

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win an amount less than or equal to €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is displayed showing the win.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the accredito banner/button.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito or accredito reservation flow is triggered.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is logged in and has not activated the accredito service.
2. GNTN product play with WinBox enabled has been completed.
3. The play resulted in a win ≤ €10,500.
test_cases.Dataset: User credentials (not activated accredito), sample winning play with WinBox enabled, amount ≤ €10,500.
test_cases.Expected Result: For a logged-in user without accredito service, clicking the accredito banner triggers the accredito or reservation flow.

test_cases.Title: NoAccreditoBanner_004_VerificaVincite_ServizioAccredito_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play with WinBox enabled and win an amount greater than €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is displayed showing the win.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the receipt screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito banner is not displayed. Instead, a box dedicated to available collection methods is shown.

Steps.Step Description: Click on the call-to-action (CTA) in the collection methods box.
Steps.Expected Result: User is redirected to https://www.giochinumerici.info/come-riscuotere.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. GNTN product play with WinBox enabled has been completed.
2. The play resulted in a win > €10,500.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample winning play with WinBox enabled, amount > €10,500.
test_cases.Expected Result: For wins > €10,500, the accredito banner is not shown. Instead, the collection methods box is displayed and the CTA redirects to the correct URL.

test_cases.Title: NoAccreditoBanner_005_VerificaVincite_ServizioAccredito_TEST_Smartphone

Steps.Step Description: Complete a GNTN product play without WinBox enabled and win any amount.
Steps.Expected Result: A digital receipt is displayed showing the win.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the receipt screen.
Steps.Expected Result: The accredito banner is not displayed regardless of the win amount.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. GNTN product play without WinBox enabled has been completed.
2. The play resulted in a win of any amount.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample winning play without WinBox enabled, any amount.
test_cases.Expected Result: For plays without WinBox enabled, the accredito banner is never shown.

test_cases.Title: Secure_Communication_Validation_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a data transfer between System A and System B using the standard communication protocol.
Steps.Expected Result: The data transfer is initiated successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Monitor the network traffic between System A and System B during the data transfer.
Steps.Expected Result: All data packets are encrypted and no sensitive information is visible in plain text.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to intercept the communication using a network sniffer tool.
Steps.Expected Result: Intercepted data is unreadable and encrypted, confirming secure transmission.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. System A and System B are both operational and connected to the same network.
2. Security policies for communication are configured as per project requirements.
3. Network monitoring and sniffing tools are available for use.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials, sample data payload for transfer.
test_cases.Expected Result: All communications between systems are encrypted and comply with defined security policies, with no sensitive data exposed in transit.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the encryption aspect of secure communication.

test_cases.Title: Unsecure_Protocol_Blocking_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to initiate a data transfer between System A and System B using an unsecure protocol (e.g., HTTP instead of HTTPS).
Steps.Expected Result: The system rejects the connection attempt or automatically redirects to a secure protocol.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. System A and System B are both operational and connected to the same network.
2. Security policies are configured to disallow unsecure protocols.
3. Unsecure protocol (e.g., HTTP) is available for testing.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials, sample data payload for transfer.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system prevents communication over unsecure protocols, ensuring only secure channels are used.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers protocol enforcement aspect of secure communication.

test_cases.Title: Certificate_Validation_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Configure System A to use an invalid or expired SSL/TLS certificate.
Steps.Expected Result: System A is configured with the invalid certificate.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to establish a secure connection from System B to System A.
Steps.Expected Result: The connection attempt fails, and an appropriate error message is logged or displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. System A and System B are both operational and connected to the same network.
2. System A is configured with an invalid or expired SSL/TLS certificate.
3. Security policies require valid certificates for communication.
test_cases.Dataset: Invalid/expired SSL/TLS certificate, test user credentials.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system rejects connections with invalid or expired certificates, ensuring certificate validation is enforced.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers certificate validation aspect of secure communication.

test_cases.Title: Sensitive_Data_Leakage_Prevention_RU13_Backend_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a data transfer containing sensitive information (e.g., personal data, credentials) between System A and System B.
Steps.Expected Result: The data transfer is initiated successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Monitor network traffic for any leakage of sensitive information in plain text.
Steps.Expected Result: No sensitive data is visible in plain text during transmission.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. System A and System B are both operational and connected to the same network.
2. Security policies for data protection are configured as per project requirements.
3. Network monitoring tools are available for use.
test_cases.Dataset: Test user credentials, sample sensitive data payload.
test_cases.Expected Result: Sensitive data is never exposed in plain text during communication between systems.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers prevention of sensitive data leakage during communication.
